overview: The lead character of the movie is modern day heroine, a girl aged 18 not yet ready to carry a burden of responsibility. She is no different from a thousand other girls either in terms of code of behavior, or style of speech, or desire to be loved. Except for one thing: in reality she is a boy.

production_companies.name: M. Razbezhkina and M. Ugarov Academy

title: Come On, Scumbags
